metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8805 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Debian ftpsync before 20171017 does not use the rsync --safe-links option, which allows remote attackers to conduct directory traversal attacks via a crafted upstream mirror.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8805` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ftpsync - 20171018
No subscription required

criterions.comment: archvsync package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20171018').
